医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现放疗后癌细胞死亡方式不同的原因儿童医学研究所的科学家们解决了癌症研究中的一个大谜团——为什么细胞在放疗后以不同的方式死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Scientists-discover-why-cancer-cells-die- Differently-after-radiotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Scientists-discover-why-cancer-cells-die- Differently-after-radiotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ba83a85-1057-417c-b9b4-918a4e561ff7 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 07:07:12 -0500 Scientists discover why cancer cells die differently after radiotherapy
新测试可以利用肿瘤 DNA 预测肺癌结果来自弗朗西斯·克里克研究所、伦敦大学学院、伦敦大学学院医院和 Personalis 的科学家在英国癌症研究中心资助的一项研究中发现，检测循环肿瘤 DNA 的测试可以预测肺癌的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-test-could-predict-lung-cancer-outcomes-using-tumor-DNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-test-could-predict-lung-cancer-outcomes-using-tumor-DNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f049868f-9239-4834-b0e0-44696b730f04 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:50:00 -0500 New test could predict lung cancer outcomes using tumor DNA
燃烧脂肪的关键蛋白质的发现可能会导致肥胖症的治疗肥胖影响着全球 6.5 亿人，影响心脏代谢疾病的发展并增加患癌症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Discovery-of-key- Protein-for-burning-fat-may-lead-to-obesity-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Discovery-of-key- Protein-for-burning-fat-may-lead-to-obesity-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b3417d0-5dee-400f-b423-f9c608ed0d0e Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:15:54 -0500 Discovery of key protein for burning fat may lead to obesity treatments
癌症诊断时肥胖与儿童死亡风险较高有关最近的一项基于人群的研究表明，在患有癌症的儿童中，诊断时患有肥胖症的儿童可能面临较高的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Obesity-at-cancer-diagnosis-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Obesity-at-cancer-diagnosis-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f605336d-a32e-426e-b1cd-9c53adfcfd48 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:05:21 -0500 Obesity at cancer diagnosis linked to higher risk of death in children
事实证明，经济激励措施在支持怀孕吸烟者戒烟方面取得了成功由马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校公共卫生和卫生政策研究员共同领导的一项新的 Cochrane 审查表明，奖励和经济激励是帮助人们戒烟的成功方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Financial-incentives-prove-successful-in-supporting-pregnant-smokers-to-quit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Financial-incentives-prove-successful-in-supporting-pregnant-smokers-to-quit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=127b6740-0050-4c47-b197-5087a4ab6b8f Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:56:35 -0500 Financial incentives prove successful in supporting pregnant smokers to quit
特朗普的回归使医疗补助计划陷入困境在乔·拜登总统的领导下，医疗补助的注册人数创下历史新高，未参保率创下历史新低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Trumpe28099s-return-puts-Medicaid-on-the-chopping-block.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Trumpe28099s-return-puts-Medicaid-on-the-chopping-block.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d6678f7-2272-41a9-a042-2270ccdf4d39 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:37:32 -0500 Trump’s return puts Medicaid on the chopping block
医学院能否将更多医生输送到初级保健队伍中？朱莉娅·洛·卡西奥 (Julia Lo Cascio) 在整个童年时期都梦想成为一名儿科医生。因此，在申请医学院时，她很高兴地发现一所专门为培训初级保健医生而建立的新小型学校：纽约大学格罗斯曼长岛医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Can-medical-schools-funnel-more-doctors-into-the-primary-care-pipeline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Can-medical-schools-funnel-more-doctors-into-the-primary-care-pipeline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=add4c0a9-3590-45ab-a18e-aade2403b960 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:34:59 -0500 Can medical schools funnel more doctors into the primary care pipeline?
短链脂肪酸丙酸和丁酸直接修饰染色质调节基因表达短链脂肪酸影响基因调控和染色质可及性，突出了它们在结直肠癌和正常细胞过程中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Short-chain-fatty-acids-propionate-and-butyrate-directly-modify-chromatin-to-regulate-gene-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Short-chain-fatty-acids-propionate-and-butyrate-directly-modify-chromatin-to-regulate-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5de9d5b1-448a-48a3-a4af-6d7c82d81ee1 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 04:51:00 -0500 Short-chain fatty acids propionate and butyrate directly modify chromatin to regulate gene expression
睡眠不足会扰乱快速眼动睡眠，从而引发侵入性记忆睡眠不足会影响大脑的记忆控制，而快速眼动睡眠对于有效抑制侵入性记忆和认知功能至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Sleep-loss-triggers-intrusive-memories-by-disrupting-REM-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Sleep-loss-triggers-intrusive-memories-by-disrupting-REM-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14fce2ca-7288-4a99-a488-45f85b9a2c5b Mon, 13 Jan 2025 04:00:00 -0500 Sleep loss triggers intrusive memories by disrupting REM sleep
离子过氧化氢 (iHP) 在现代消毒中的兴起了解电离过氧化氢消毒的好处。 Jim Reynolds 分享了有关其应用及其对行业标准影响的专家见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-Rise-of-Ionized-Hydrogen-Peroxy-(iHP)-in-Modern-Disinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-Rise-of-Ionized-Hydrogen-Peroxy-(iHP)-in-Modern-Disinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed84563c-cad3-4bb9-bb71-af5ef88926a1 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 03:29:00 -0500 The Rise of Ionized Hydrogen Peroxide (iHP) in Modern Disinfection
